mapper.select: SELECT banner_num, banner_title, CASE WHEN banner_position = '01' THEN '배너' WHEN banner_position = '02' THEN '팝업' END AS banner_position, banner_start || ' ' || banner_end AS banner_period, CASE WHEN banner_visible = '01' THEN '노출' WHEN banner_visible = '02' THEN '비노출' END AS banner_visible, banner_date FROM banners_popups;
SELECT banner_num, banner_title, banner_position, banner_start, banner_end, banner_original, banner_changed, banner_visible FROM banners_popups; WHERE banner_num = #{banner_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banners_popups( banner_num, banner_title, banner_position, banner_visible, banner_start, banner_end, banner_original, banner_changed, banner_date) VALUES ( banners_popups_seq.nextval, #{banner_title}, #{banner_position}, #{banner_visible}, #{banner_start}, #{banner_end}, #{banner_original}, #{banner_changed}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE banners_popups SET banner_title = #{banner_title}, banner_position = #{banner_position}, banner_visible = #{banner_visible}, banner_start = #{banner_start}, banner_end = #{banner_end}, banner_original = #{banner_original}, banner_changed = #{banner_changed} WHERE banner_num = #{banner_num}
